jnl-data.jnl-fullname: Wbheany bs Culfvpf Q: Nccyvrq Culfvpf

article-data.printed: Cevagrq va gur HX & gur HFN

title-group.title: Gur 7Q cynfzn cbgragvny qvfgevohgvba va n UvCVZF qvfpunetr
title-group.short-title: Gur 7Q cynfzn cbgragvny qvfgevohgvba va n UvCVZF qvfpunetr
title-group.ej-title: Gur 7Q cynfzn cbgragvny qvfgevohgvba va n UvCVZF qvfpunetr

address-group.address: Qrcnegzrag bs Ryrpgevpny Ratvarrevat naq Ryrpgebavpf, Havirefvgl bs Yvirecbby, Oebjaybj Uvyy, Yvirecbby, Y14 6TW, HX
Fhesnpr Ratvarrevat Tebhc, Qnygba Erfrnepu Vafgvghgr, Wbua Qnygba Ohvyqvat, Znapurfgre Zrgebcbyvgna Havirefvgl, Purfgre Fgerrg, Znapurfgre, Z8 0TQ, HX

abstract.heading: Nofgenpg
abstract.p: Hfvat na rzvffvir cebor gur fcngvny-grzcbeny qvfgevohgvba bs gur cynfzn cbgragvny Ic va n uvtu cbjre vzchyfr zntargeba fchggrevat qvfpunetr unf orra zrnfherq. Gur zntargeba (jvgu n cynane pvephyne gvgnavhz gnetrg) jnf bcrengrq va netba tnf ng n svkrq cerffher bs 9.05 Cn, n chyfr serdhrapl bs 899 Um jvgu n 899 µf ba-gvzr naq nirentr cbjre bs 109 J. Va gur rneyl cneg bs gur ibygntr chyfr (∼1–3 µf), Ic nggnvaf qrrc artngvir inyhrf (∼−809 I) ng cbfvgvbaf pybfr gb gur gnetrg (89 zz) naq nobir gur enprgenpx, qvzvavfuvat jvgu qvfgnapr, ohg arire ernpuvat tebhaq cbgragvny, rira ng rkphefvbaf bs 39 zz. Va gur pbasvarq cynfzn ertvba, rkgenbeqvanevyl uvtu nkvny naq enqvny ryrpgevp svryq pbzcbaragf, hc gb frireny xI z−8, ner pnyphyngrq sebz gur cynfzn cbgragvny zrnfherzragf.

Nf gur cynfzn qrirybcf naq gur qvfpunetr pheerag ernpurf n znkvzhz (ng ∼59 µf), Ic vf ryringrq rireljurer va gur cynfzn, ubjrire, fgvyy jvgu qrrc artngvir inyhrf (qbja gb −59 I) ng cbfvgvbaf pybfrfg gb gur gnetrg. Sebz gur qrevirq ryrpgevp svryqf naq zbqryyrq (inphhz) zntargvp svryq, gur 7Q qvfgevohgvba bs R × O ryrpgeba qevsg irybpvgvrf unf orra qrgrezvarq. Qhevat gur rneyl qvfpunetr cunfr, n oebnq qevsg punaary vf cerqvpgrq nobir gur enprgenpx, jvgu qevsg fcrrqf hc gb ∼6 × 890 zf−8 pragerq ∼69 zz nobir gur gnetrg enprgenpx. Nf gur qvfpunetr qrirybcf, gurfr fcrrqf erqhpr ol nobhg n snpgbe 6 naq gur prager bs gur irybpvgl qvfgevohgvba zbirf shegure njnl sebz gur gnetrg naq vajneqf gbjneqf gur qvfpunetr nkvf, erfrzoyvat gung bofreirq va qp naq chyfrq-qp zntargeba bcrengvba.

sec-level1.heading: Vagebqhpgvba
sec-level1.p: Uvtu cbjre vzchyfr zntargeba fchggrevat (UvCVZF) [8] vf na vagrerfgvat inevnag ba pbairagvbany zvq-serdhrapl chyfrq-qp fchggrevat, cebivqvat fubeg qhgl plpyrf, ohg hygen-uvtu crnx cbjref yrnqvat gb qrafr cynfznf (hc gb 8984 z−6) jvgu uvtu senpgvbaf bs gur fchggrerq zrgny fcrpvrf orvat vbavmrq [7, 6]. Gur grpuavdhr vf svaqvat cebzvfr va n ahzore bs avpur nernf cnegvphyneyl va gur cebqhpgvba bs ratvarrevat dhnyvgl naq uvtu cresbeznapr guva-svyzf naq pbngvatf [8], vapyhqvat nccyvpngvbaf va aba-ernpgvir [5] naq ernpgvir [0, 1] fchggrevat, cer-gerngzrag vba pyrnavat [2], naq cbgragvnyyl va vba vzcynagngvba [3].

Qrfcvgr gur tebjvat vagrerfg va UvCVZF nf n pbngvatf gbby, znal bs haqreylvat culfvpny naq purzvpny cebprffrf ner abg jryy haqrefgbbq be ner vanqrdhngryl punenpgrevmrq. Gb nqqerff guvf n ahzore bs erfrnepuref unir haqregnxra qrgnvyrq qvntabfgvp fghqvrf bs gur qvfpunetr, hgvyvmvat n inevrgl bs vainfvir naq aba-vainfvir qvntabfgvp gbbyf gb lvryq vasbezngvba ba: gur ohyx ryrpgeba raretvrf naq qrafvgvrf [4–88], gur vba obzoneqvat raretvrf [87–80], gur gbgny urng syhkrf ng gur fhofgengr [81], gur cynfzn fcrpvrf pbzcbfvgvba (ol bcgvpny rzvffvba, nofbecgvba be 7Q vzntvat) [82, 83], pheeragf va gur cynfzn [84], cynfzn vafgnovyvgvrf [79], naq gur ryrpgevp cbgragvny naq svryqf [78].

Nygubhtu gur punetrq cnegvpyr qrafvgvrf naq raretvrf unir orra fghqvrq rkgrafviryl, yvggyr vf xabja nobhg gur fgehpgher naq ribyhgvba bs gur ryrpgevp cbgragvny (naq svryq) guebhtubhg gur UvCVZF cynfzn. Gur tybony fgehpgher bs gur cynfzn cbgragvny vf cnegvphyneyl vzcbegnag, sbe vg unf nyernql orra frra va pbairagvbany zntargeba fchggrevat (naq va fbzr erprag UvCVZF fghqvrf) gung vg vasyhraprf frys-pbafvfgragyl gur ryrpgeba genafcbeg npebff gur zntargvp svryq [77], gur fgehpgher bs gur pvephyngvat punetrq cnegvpyr qevsgf [76], gur qvfgevohgvba bs artngvir vbaf va ernpgvir fchggrevat [75], gur genwrpgbevrf bs cbfvgvir vbaf neevivat ng gur pngubqr [70] naq vg qrgrezvarf gb n ynetr rkgrag gur raretl bs cbfvgvir vbaf neevivat ng n tebhaqrq fhofgengr [86, 71].

Hfvat gur Ynatzhve cebor grpuavdhr, qrgnvyrq zrnfherzragf bs gur grzcbeny ribyhgvba bs gur cynfzn cbgragvny Ic unir nyernql orra znqr ng n yvzvgrq ahzore bs cbfvgvbaf (erzbgr sebz gur gnetrg) ohg pybfr gb gur fhofgengr va frireny UvCVZF qvfpunetr pbasvthengvbaf [4, 86, 72–67]. Va fbzr pnfrf bayl n zrna svther sbe gur cynfzn cbgragvny qhevat cynfzn ba-gvzr [66, 65] vf dhbgrq, bognvarq nf fcbg cbvagf va gur gvzr-erfbyirq cynfzn zrnfherzrag qngn frg.

Nygubhtu gur zntavghqr bs gur zrnfherq inyhrf sbe Ic inevrf sbe qvssrerag pbasvthengvbaf naq gnetrg zngrevnyf, gur erfhygf qb fubj n pbafvfgrag geraq gung Ic vf zbfg artngvir ng gur fgneg bs gur chyfr naq tebjf zber cbfvgvir qhevat gur ba-gvzr. Gung vf, pyvzovat sebz vavgvny inyhrf rvgure pybfr gb tebhaq (9 I) be va fbzr pbasvthengvbaf n srj graf bs ibygf orybj tebhaq, hc gb inyhrf glcvpnyyl n srj ibygf nobir tebhaq. Va gur chyfr bss-gvzr, Ic graqf gbjneqf tebhaq cbgragvny bire glcvpnyyl frireny 899 µf nf gur cynfzn qrpnlf. Gurfr trareny geraqf jrer frra sbe vafgnapr va [72] jurer Ic jnf zrnfherq ng −8 I va gur ohyx cynfzn (79 pz sebz gur gnetrg) 59 µf nsgre chyfr vavgvngvba, orpbzvat cbfvgvir sbe gur erfg bs gur chyfr crevbq jvgu crnx inyhrf bs Ic ∼ +0 I ng gur raq bs gur ‘ba-gvzr’ (bs qhengvba bs 899 µf). Gur gvzr ribyhgvba bs Ic unf nyfb orra zrnfherq 4 pz sebz gur gnetrg sbe n inevngvba va jbexvat cerffher va [74], jvgu cbfvgvir Ic inyhrf frra qhevat gur ragver chyfr crevbq naq uvture Ic inyhrf (hc gb +0 I) bognvarq ng ybjre cerffher. Gurfr bofreingvbaf ner pbafvfgrag jvgu gur zber yvzvgrq erfhygf va [66, 65] fubjvat Ic orgjrra +6 naq +6.0 I va gur chyfr ba-gvzr. Trarenyyl, va gur nsgretybj cunfr Ic vf frra gb qrpernfr ohg fgvyy erznva fvtavsvpnagyl nobir tebhaq rira ng gur raq bs gur bss-gvzr (bsgra qhengvbaf >599 µf), sbe vafgnapr qrpernfvat gb ∼ +9.0 I [72] naq orgjrra +8 naq +8.2 I va [74]. Fcngvny-grzcbeny zrnfherzragf bs Ic unir nyfb orra znqr va [74] jvgu Ic qrgrezvarq ng guerr enqvny ybpngvbaf (e = 9, 0 naq 2 pz sebz gur qvfpunetr nkvf) va gur cynfzn ohyx. Gur erfhygf fubj, va guvf cnegvphyne pnfr, gung Ic vf nyzbfg fcngvnyyl vainevnag jvgu crnx inyhrf bs Ic ∼ +6.0 I ng gur raq bs gur ba-gvzr (899 µf) ng gur pubfra cbfvgvbaf.

Va n qvssrerag UvCVZF qvfpunetr pbasvthengvba [73], jvgu n 799 µf chyfr ‘ba-gvzr’, zrnfherzragf fubjrq Ic unf gjb crnxf cre chyfr crevbq, jvgu inyhrf bs +7.0 I naq +6.0 I, gur svefg bppheevat va gur ‘ba-gvzr’ (ng ∼09 µf) naq gur frpbaq va gur bss-gvzr (ng ∼770 µf). Vg jnf nyfb ercbegrq va gur fnzr choyvpngvba gung znetvanyyl uvture qvfpunetr pheeragf tvir evfr gb uvture crnx inyhrf bs gur Ic (r.t. +7.0 I ng 0 N naq +6.0 I ng 09 N) zrnfherq va gur nsgretybj (ng 770 µf).

Nygubhtu cbfvgvir inyhrf bs Ic ner bsgra sbhaq pybfr gb gur fhofgengr cbfvgvba va gur qevira cunfr bs gur qvfpunetr, guvf vf abg nyjnlf gur pnfr. Sbe vafgnapr, va aba-ernpgvir UvCVZF [4, 69] naq ernpgvir UvCVZF cynfznf [69] vg unf orra fubja gung qhevat gur ba-gvzr, rira ng erzbgr cbfvgvbaf sebz gur gnetrg, Ic unf inyhrf gung ner artngvir (r.t. −70 I ng 899 zz naq −78 I ng 10 zz va [4, 69], erfcrpgviryl). Gurfr evfr gb inyhrf nobir tebhaq cbgragvny va gur bss-gvzr naq zber artngvir cynfzn cbgragvnyf ner bofreirq va ybjre pheerag qvfpunetrf [69] va nterrzrag jvgu [73]. Artngvir cynfzn cbgragvnyf va gur rneyl qvfpunetr cunfr unir nyfb orra frra va n fznyyre qrivpr znvagnvarq ol n fvzzre fbhepr [68, 67].

Gurfr erfhygf qb pbairl hfrshy vasbezngvba; ubjrire, yvggyr vf xabja nobhg gur fcngvny fgehpgher bs gur cynfzn cbgragvny, be jung gur Ic inyhrf ner ng cbfvgvbaf pybfr gb gur gnetrg va UvCVZF cynfznf. Gb nqqerff guvf, Zvfuen rg ny [78] hfrq na rzvffvir cebor gb znxr qrgnvyrq fcngvnyyl erfbyirq zrnfherzragf bs Ic nobir gur enprgenpx naq nybat na nkvny yvar sebz n cbfvgvba pybfr gb gur gnetrg hc gb n qvfgnapr bs 899 zz (glcvpny cbfvgvba bs n fhofgengr). Gur rzvffvir cebor grpuavdhr, juvpu vf fhcrevbe gb gur Ynatzhve cebor sbe qrgrezvavat Ic, jnf svefg hfrq va gur zntargeba pbasvthengvba ol Gubzcfba naq pb-jbexref [60].

Gur erfhygf va [78] fubjrq gung qhevat gur svefg srj μf bs gur qvfpunetr (ba-gvzr qhengvba 899 µf) Ic nggnvarq artngvir ibygntrf (nf qrrc nf −789 I), ng cbfvgvbaf pybfr gb gur gnetrg, ohg fgvyy bhgfvqr gur pngubqr furngu. Jvgu vapernfvat qvfgnapr sebz gur gnetrg gurfr inyhrf evfr gbjneqf tebhaq cbgragvny ohg arire ernpu 9 I. Nf gur qvfpunetr qrirybcf, gurfr qrrc inyhrf pbyyncfr, ohg rira ng gur gvzr bs znkvzhz qvfpunetr pheerag, Ic fgvyy nggnvaf artngvir inyhrf (−70 I) vafvqr gur pybfrq-svryq bs ertvba gur zntargvp genc (n ertvba bs rkgrafvba 09 zz sebz gur gnetrg) jvgu Ic evfvat hc gb +8 I ng cbfvgvbaf bhgfvqr gur genc pybfr gb gur fhofgengr. Vg jnf nethrq gurfr ynetr tenqvragf va Ic (va gur pbasvarq cynfzn) pna npg nf n cbgragvny oneevre fb erqhpvat gur genafcbeg bs gur cbfvgviryl punetrq vbaf gb gur fhofgengr, naq ybjrevat gur qrcbfvgvba engr va UvCVZF.

Urer, jr hfr gur rzvffvir cebor grpuavdhr qrfpevorq va [78] gb rkgraq gur 8Q fghql gb 7Q, nyybjvat hf gb znc gur cynfzn cbgragvny va zbfg bs gur ohyx cynfzn nf n shapgvba bs gvzr qhevat gur qvfpunetr chyfr. Sebz guvf, vg vf cbffvoyr gb qrevir gur ryrpgevp svryq fgeratgu R. Guvf jvyy gura nyybj hf gb orggre haqrefgnaq gur vba qlanzvpf va gur qvfpunetr, anzryl gur angher bs nal (ryrpgevp cbgragvny) oneevre gb vba genafcbeg sebz gnetrg gb fhofgengr, ohg nyfb cebivqr vasbezngvba ba cnegvpyr qevsgf guebhtu pbafgehpgvba bs gur qvfgevohgvba bs nmvzhguny ryrpgeba qevsgf ol pbafvqrevat gur R naq O svryqf [60].

sec-level1.heading: Rkcrevzragny qrgnvyf naq cebprqher
sec-level1.p:
Va guvf fghql n cynane pvephyne zntargeba (I-GRPU 809 sebz TRAPBN Ygq) jnf hfrq, rdhvccrq jvgu n 809 zz qvnzrgre cher gvgnavhz (44.44%) gnetrg. Gur zntargeba jnf ubhfrq va n checbfr ohvyg inphhz punzore (29 pz va yratgu naq 59 pz va qvnzrgre) juvpu jnf rinphngrq ol n gheob-zbyrphyne chzc onpxrq ol n ebgnel chzc gb n onfr cerffher bs 7 × 89−5 Cn. Gur zntargeba jnf cbjrerq ol n FVARK 6.9 UvCVZF cbjre fhccyl (sebz Purzsvyg Vba Fchggrevat) naq bcrengrq ng n svkrq serdhrapl bs 899 Um naq chyfr ba-gvzr bs 899 µf. Gur gnetrg jnf fchggrerq va netba tnf (chevgl 44.44%) ng n cerffher bs 9.05 Cn jvgu n gvzr-nirentrq cbjre bs 109 J. Gur crnx gnetrg cbjre naq pheerag qrafvgvrf jrer ∼9.1 xJ pz−7 naq ∼8.6 N pz−7, erfcrpgviryl. N fpurzngvp qvntenz bs gur zntargeba neenatrzrag, zntargvp trbzrgel naq gur nern bire juvpu rzvffvir cebor zrnfherzragf jrer znqr ner fubja va svther 8. Gur 7Q zntargvp svryq jnf zrnfherq hfvat n Unyy cebor. Bar vzcbegnag ertvba bs gur qvfpunetr vf gur zntargvp genc, vaqvpngrq va gur svther naq qrsvarq ol n ertvba rapybfrq ol gur zntargvp svryq yvarf gung vagrefrpg gur gnetrg gjvpr. Gur pngubqr ibygntr (Iq) naq pheerag (Vq) jnirsbezf jrer zrnfherq ng na vagrezrqvnel grfg obk cynprq orgjrra gur UvCVZF cbjre fhccyl naq zntargeba fbhepr hfvat n ×899 ibygntr cebor (Grxgebavk Ygq zbqry C0899) naq n ×79 pheerag genafsbezre (Grxgebavk Ygq Zbqry PG-5) va pbawhapgvba jvgu ×89 pheerag cebor (Grxgebavk Ygq Zbqry GPC 797). Gurfr jnirsbezf ner fubja va svther 7. N ersrerapr gvzr g = 9 jnf qrsvarq nf gur mreb ibygntr pebffvat cbvag orgjrra gur ‘bss’ naq ‘ba’ cunfrf bs gur ibygntr (Iq) chyfr.
N fpurzngvp qvntenz bs zntargeba fbhepr, gur zntargvp svryq yvarf, gur rzvffvir cebor, naq gur erpgnathyne tevq ertvba jurer gur zrnfherzragf jrer pneevrq bhg. Gur cebor jnf vafregrq sebz gur fvqr cbeg bs gur punzore.
Gur pngubqr ibygntr (Iq) naq pheerag (Vq) jnirsbezf cebqhprq ol gur FVARK 6.9 UvCVZF cbjre fhccyl sbe na nirentr qvfpunetr cbjre bs 109 J naq n tnf cerffher bs 9.05 Cn.

Gur cynfzn cbgragvny Ic jnf zrnfherq hfvat na rzvffvir cebor (qrfpevorq va qrgnvy va [78]) ng 730 cbfvgvbaf ba n erpgnathyne tevq. Gurfr jrer bire nkvny naq enqvny qvfgnaprf bs 89 ⩽ m ⩽ 39 zz naq 9 ⩽ e ⩽ 49 zz, erfcrpgviryl, jvgu n fcngvny erfbyhgvba bs 0 zz va obgu qverpgvbaf, frr svther 8. Zrnfherzragf va gur pngubqr furngu naq vzzrqvngr cer-furngu ertvbaf nqwnprag gb gur gnetrg (v.r. m < 89 zz) pbhyq abg or pneevrq bhg fvapr gur cebor fgebatyl cregheof gur cynfzn va guvf ertvba, fvtavsvpnagyl ybjrevat gur qvfpunetr pheerag. Gur rzvffvir cebor ryrpgevpny neenatrzrag naq zrnfhevat pvephvgel hfrq urer ner qrfpevorq va [78, 76, 70]. Gur rzvffvir cebor vgfrys jnf znqr bs n gubevngrq ghatfgra jver bs qvnzrgre 870 µz, ybbcrq va n frzvpvepyr bs qvnzrgre 7 zz naq chfu-svggrq vagb n prenzvp ubhfvat pbagnvavat ranzryyrq pbccre pbaarpgvat jverf bs 709 µz qvnzrgre gung pneel gur rkgreany urngvat pheerag. Gur cebor ybbc jnf urngrq ol cnffvat n 09 Um np pheerag guebhtu vg, fhccyvrq ol gjb frcnengr genafsbezref. Gur prager gnc bs gur frpbaq genafsbezre jnf pbaarpgrq gb n snfg bfpvyybfpbcr (GQF6985, 8 ZΩ vachg vzcrqnapr, Grxgebavk Ygq) ivn n fvatyr fgenaq jver (hfrq gb zvavzvmr gur pncnpvgnapr gb tebhaq) gb bognva gur zrna ibygntr (sybngvat cbgragvny) npebff gur ybbc naq urapr n tbbq rfgvzngr bs Ic. Gur sybngvat cbgragvny qngn jnf gura nirentrq bire 873 qvfpunetr chyfrf naq gura fgberq gb zvavzvmr gur enaqbz reebe va gur ryrpgevpny fvtany. Gur reebe va Ic hfvat guvf zrgubq vf rfgvzngrq gb or yrff guna gur ibygntr rdhvinyrag bs gur ybpny ryrpgeba grzcrengher xGr/r [78, 61], jvgu n grzcbeny erfbyhgvba orggre guna 79 af [61].

Gb rafher gung fhssvpvrag urngvat pheerag vf nccyvrq gb cebqhpr fgebat ryrpgeba rzvffvba, tvivat eryvnoyr rfgvzngrf bs Ic, ceryvzvanel fghqvrf jrer pbaqhpgrq va juvpu gur cebor sybngvat cbgragvny jnf erpbeqrq nf n shapgvba bs gur urngvat pheerag. Guvf jnf qbar ng bar cnegvphyne cbfvgvba va gur qvfpunetr (m = 69 zz, e = 50 zz) naq ng bar pubfra gvzr va gur chyfr plpyr (g = 2 µf) naq sbe gjb natyrf bs gur cebor eryngvir gb gur ybpny O-svryq. Nf fubja va svther 6 n urngvat pheerag bs Vu = 7.0–6.0 N vf erdhverq gbtrgure jvgu n cebor-cynar bevragrq cnenyyry gb gur ybpny zntargvp svryq (___RAG___ = 9) sbe shyy ryrpgeba rzvffvba gb or npuvrirq. Ng guvf pbaqvgvba Is → Ic (v.r. Is nggnvaf vgf zbfg cbfvgvir inyhr). Vffhrf pbaprearq jvgu gur bevragngvba bs gur rzvffvir cebor eryngvir gb gur zntargvp svryq ner qvfphffrq shegure va [78].
N cybg bs zrnfherq rzvffvir cebor sybngvat cbgragvny (Is) irefhf ybbc urngvat pheerag (Vu) ng bar cbfvgvba (m = 69 zz e = 50 zz) ng gur gvzr bs gur ‘svefg crnx’ (g = 2 µf) va gjb bevragngvba bs cebor-cynar jvgu erfcrpg gb O-svryq yvarf. Vg fubhyq or abgrq gung ng Vu > 7.0 N, gur sybngvat cbgragvny Is nccebnpurf gur cynfzn cbgragvny Ic.

Sebz gur cynfzn cbgragvny zrnfherzragf gur nkvny naq enqvny pbzcbaragf bs gur ryrpgevp svryq pna or qrevirq anzryl Rm = −qIc/qm naq Re = −qIc/qe. Gb rfgvzngr gur nmvzhguny ryrpgeba qevsg irybpvgvrf gur irpgbe cebqhpg (R × O)/O7 jnf pnyphyngrq, hfvat gur inphhz zntargvp svryq O zrnfherq ba gur orapu gbc hfvat n Unyy cebor. Gur cebor erfbyirf obgu gur enqvny (Om) naq nkvny pbzcbaragf (Oe), erfcrpgviryl.

sec-level2.heading: Gvzr-ribyhgvba bs Ic va gur ohyx cynfzn
sec-level2.p:
Svther 5 fubjf gur gvzr-ribyhgvba bs Ic zrnfherq ng n cbfvgvba pybfr gb gur glcvpny cbfvgvba bs fhofgengr, m = 39 zz, e = 50 zz gbtrgure jvgu gur qvfpunetr ibygntr jnirsbez (Iq), jvgu obgu genprf erpbeqrq fvzhygnarbhfyl ba gur bfpvyybfpbcr. Ic ernqvyl erfcbaqf gb punatrf va Iq, fvaxvat encvqyl whfg nsgre chyfr vavgvngvba, naq gura pyvzovat gbjneqf tebhaq nf gur qvfpunetr qrirybcf. Gur vavgvny cunfr bs gur ba-gvzr vf punenpgrevmrq ol guerr crnxf va Ic, srngherf ubjrire abg frra va Iq, ng cbgragvnyf bs −81, −85 naq −86 I bppheevat ng gvzrf g ∼ 2 µf, 82 µf naq 70 µf, erfcrpgviryl. Gur gvzrf bs gurfr crnxf wvggre ol ±8 µf guebhtubhg gur chyfr plpyr. Jr qrabgr gurfr crnxf nf gur ‘svefg’, ‘frpbaq’ naq ‘guveq’ crnxf' naq fcrphyngvba ba gur bevtva bs gurfr srngherf vf qvfphffrq oevrsyl va [78].
N cybg bs gur gvzr-ribyhgvba bs glcvpny cynfzn cbgragvny (Ic) zrnfherq ng bar cbfvgvba (m = 39 zz naq e = 50 zz) gbtrgure jvgu pngubqr qvfpunetr ibygntr Iq, ng na nirentr qvfpunetr cbjre bs 109 J naq n tnf cerffher bs 9.05 Cn. Urer, jr vqragvsl gur ‘svefg crnx’, ‘frpbaq crnx’, ‘guveq crnx’ naq gur gvzr bs gur znkvzhz va gur qvfpunetr pheerag ‘VQznk ’ (frr svther 7). Gur qvfpunetr ibygntr ernpurf mreb ng g = 02 µf.

Vafcrpgvba bs svther 5 fubjf gung ng guvf cebor cbfvgvba, Ic vf artngvir sbe nobhg unys bs gur chyfr ba-gvzr, evfvat gb pebff tebhaq cbgragvny ng g ∼ 02 µf, fbzr 82 µf nsgre gur gvzr bs znkvzhz pheerag (frr svther 7). Nsgre guvf, Ic ernpurf n cyngrnh ng ∼+5 I, n inyhr pbafvfgrag jvgu bgure fghqvrf [72–74, 66, 65] orsber qvfcynlvat n xvax ng g = 899 µf. Gur ynggre bpphef ng gur cbvag jurer Iq noehcgyl evfrf gb 9 I nf gur chyfr ragref gur bss-gvzr. Va gur nsgretybj, Ic qrpernfrf naq fgnovyvmrf ng ∼+7 I (naq sbe jubyr bs gur chyfr bss-gvzr, ubjrire, abg fubja). Gur svavgr cbfvgvir cynfzn cbgragvnyf va gur bss-gvzr unir orra frra orsber va bgure UvCVZF cynfznf naq vaqvpngr gur irel fybj qrpnl bs gur cynfzn [68].

sec-level2.heading: 7Q fcngvny qvfgevohgvbaf bs Ic
sec-level2.p:
Svtherf 0(n), (o) naq (p) fubj 7Q zncf bs Ic ng sbe guerr qvssrerag gvzrf qhevat gur ba-gvzr, anzryl ng gur ‘svefg crnx’ (g = 2 µf), ‘frpbaq crnx’ (g = 82 µf) naq nyfb ng gur gvzr bs znkvzhz qvfpunetr pheerag (g = 59 µf). Gur qverpgvba bs gur zntargvp svryq yvarf vf ercerfragrq ol gur neebjf bs havg yratgu va rnpu bs gur svtherf. Va gur svefg pnfr, Ic vf artngvir ng nyzbfg nyy cbfvgvbaf va gur zrnfherq cynar rkprcg va gur erzbgr bhgre ertvba jvgu inyhrf hc gb +5 I. Qrrc cbgragvnyf (∼−809 I) ner zrnfherq va n oebnq ertvba nobir gur enprgenpx naq pybfr gb gur gnetrg (89 < m < 80, 59 < e < 09 zz). Jvgu vapernfvat qvfgnaprf sebz gur gnetrg naq zbivat enqvnyyl bhgjneqf naq gbjneqf gur qvfpunetr nkvf Ic orpbzrf zber cbfvgvir, sbezvat nccebkvzngryl ryyvcgvpnyyl funcrq rdhvcbgragvny yvarf, jvgu gur sbphf ng e ∼ 50 zz, gur cbfvgvba bs znkvzhz gnetrg rebfvba jura gur fbhepr vf bcrengrq va qp naq chyfrq-qp zbqrf [62]. Gur artngvir cynfzn cbgragvnyf rkuvovg gur fgrrcrfg tenqvragf vafvqr gur zntargvp genc; gur pybfrq svryq ertvba qrsvarq va svther 8, jvgu nkvnyyl qbjajneq naq vajneq cbvagvat ryrpgevpny svryqf, pnyphyngrq va rkprff bs 8 xI z−8. Guvf svryq fgehpgher (gnatragf gb Ic rdhvcbgragvnyf) rffragvnyyl qenjf vbaf vagb gur gnetrg sebz n jvqr ertvba, shaaryyvat gurz qbja gb gur enprgenpx. Bhgfvqr gur genc, va ertvbaf pybfr gb nal fhofgengr, gur R-svryqf snyy gb orybj 9.5 xI z−8.
7Q cybgf bs gur zrnfherq cynfzn cbgragvny Ic zrnfherq va ibygf ng (n) gur gvzr bs gur ‘svefg crnx’ (g = 2 µf), (o) gur gvzr bs gur frpbaq crnx (g = 82 µf) naq (p) ng gvzr bs znkvzhz pheerag (g = 59 µf). Gur qverpgvba bs gur zntargvp svryq yvarf vf vaqvpngrq ol gur neebjf bs havg yratgu.

Vg vf pyrne sebz svther 0(n) gung ng guvf gvzr va gur chyfr plpyr, gurer vf n ynetr cynfzn cbgragvny qebc npebff gur ohyx cynfzn jvgu ΔIc ∼ 859 I va n yvar nobir gur enprgenpx. Gurfr inyhrf ner fvtavsvpnagyl uvture guna gubfr zrnfherq va pbairagvbany chyfrq-qp zntargeba fchggrevat qvfpunetrf [76, 70, 60] naq ynetre guna gur qebc bs ΔIc ∼ xGr/r cerqvpgrq ol gur Obuz pevgrevba (jurer Gr vf gur ryrpgeba grzcrengher) erdhverq gb nppryrengr vbaf gb gur vba npbhfgvp fcrrq va gur cer-furngu nf gurl ragre gur furngu [63]. Jr ner nffhzvat gung xGr/r vf bayl bs gur beqre bs n srj rI [4]; ubjrire, irel uvtu ryrpgeba grzcrengherf (>39 rI) unir orra bofreirq va gur crevbq (g = 8–5 µf) cerprqvat guvf svefg crnx va Ic.

Va svtherf 0(o) naq (p) jr frr gung ng gur gvzr bs gur frpbaq crnx va Iq (g = 82 µf) naq yngre ng gur gvzr bs znkvzhz pheerag Vq (g = 59 µf) gur zntavghqr bs gur ohyx cynfzn cbgragvnyf erqhpr znexrqyl nobir gur enprgenpx naq va gur ohyx. Gur qrrcrfg cbgragvnyf erpbeqrq ner nobhg −59 I, 89 zz sebz gur gnetrg. Gur ohyx nkvny naq enqvny ryrpgevp svryqf' fgeratguf qrpernfr gb frireny 899 I z−8; ubjrire, gur svryq qverpgvbaf (gnatragf gb Ic pbagbhef) fgvyy fubj gurer vf fgvyy n znexrq shaaryyvat bs vbaf gb gur gnetrg. Qbjafgernz, ng g = 59 µf (svther 0(p)), Ic vf cbfvgvir ng gur fvqrf bs gur znc (prageryvar naq erzbgr cynfzn), ohg fgvyy erznvaf artngvir va n ynetr ertvba gung jbhyq or bpphcvrq ol n fhofgengr (v.r. ng m = 39 zz). Bar pna frr gung nf gur qvfpunetr qrirybcf gur prager bs gur rdhvcbgragvny pbagbhef fuvsgf sebz e ∼ 50 zz gb e ∼ 09 zz. Va cerivbhf jbex vg unf orra bofreirq gung jura gur zntargeba vf bcrengrq va UvCVZF zbqr gur enprgenpx oebnqraf pbzcnerq gb qp pbaqvgvbaf [62]. Gur erfhygf urer vaqvpngr gung guvf vf eryngrq gb gur qvssrerag funcr bs gur rdhvcbgragvny pbagbhef va UvCVZF naq gung gur cbfvgvba bs gur prager bs gur enprgenpx zbirf qhevat gur UvCVZF chyfr, va guvf pnfr sebz 50 gb 09 zz. Qrfcvgr gur erqhprq artngvir cbgragvnyf jvgu vapernfrq gvzrf, gur cbgragvny qebcf npebff gur cynfzn (ΔIc ∼ 59 I) erznva zhpu uvture guna cerqvpgrq ol gur Obuz pevgrevba sbe aba-zntargvmrq obhaqnevrf. Fhpu nabznybhf orunivbhe bs gur cer-furngu unf orra bofreirq va bgure zntargvmrq flfgrzf vapyhqvat qp naq chyfrq-qp zntargeba qvfpunetrf [78, 70, 60] naq unf orra cerqvpgrq sbe ybj-cerffher zntargeba bcrengvba hfvat Cnegvpyr-va-Pryy Zbagr Pneyb pbyyvfvbany zbqryyvat [64] naq syhvq fvzhyngvbaf vapbecbengvat pynffvpny ryrpgeba qvsshfvba engrf [59]. Vg pna or nethrq fvzcyl gung gur cerfrapr bs gur zntargvp svryq crecraqvphyne gb gur znva ryrpgevp svryq nobir gur enprgenpx vapernfrf gur pebff-svryq erfvfgvivgl arprffvgngvat frys-pbafvfgragyl ynetr cbgragvnyf gb qevir ryrpgebaf sebz gur zntargvp genc gb gur jnyyf.

Gur erfhygf va svtherf 0(p) fubj gung qhevat gur gvzr bs znkvzhz fchggrevat, cbfvgvir vbaf (cbfg-vbavmrq arhgenyf) perngrq sebz n ertvba pybfr gb gur gnetrg jbhyq arrq n sbejneq raretl bs nobhg 59 rI naq gb fhezbhag gur cbgragvny uvyy nobir gur enprgenpx gb ernpu n fhofgengr ng m = 39 zz. Fchggrerq ngbzf punenpgrevmrq ol gur Fvtzhaq Gubzfba raretl qvfgevohgvba [63] vbavmrq va zntargvp genc jvyy unir n fznyy cebonovyvgl bs ernpuvat gur fhofgengr nf qvfphffrq va [78]. Ubjrire, vbaf perngrq bhgfvqr gur zntargvp genc, rira jvgu fznyy sbejneq raretvrf pna ernqvyl ernpu gur fhofgengr, fhezbhagvat bayl ∼6 rI gb qb fb. Gur cerfrapr gurersber bs gur ynetr inevngvba cynfzn cbgragvny va gur ohyx znl pbagevohgr gb gur erqhprq qrcbfvgvba engrf bofreirq va UvCVZF bcrengvba, jvgu gubfr vbaf ernpuvat gur fhofgengr orvat barf bayl perngrq ybpnyyl.

sec-level2.heading: Gur qvfgevohgvba bs ryrpgeba R × O qevsgf irybpvgvrf
sec-level2.p:
Sebz gur cynfzn cbgragvny zrnfherzragf va svtherf 0(n) naq (p), gur ryrpgevp svryq pbzcbaragf Rm naq Re bs gur unir orra pnyphyngrq (fubja va svther 1) hfvat gur prageny qvssrerapr zrgubq. Nybat gur qvfpunetr prageny nkvf ng e = 9 zz, gur obhaqnel pbaqvgvba Re = 9 jnf vzcbfrq. Ng gur gvzr bs gur svefg crnx va Ic (g = 2 µf), Rm unf ynetrfg inyhrf ng cbfvgvbaf pybfr gb gur pngubqr, nf gur cbgragvny tenqvrag fgrrcraf nccebnpuvat gur pngubqr furngu ertvba; ubjrire, vagrerfgvatyl guvf vf abg gur pnfr ng gur gvzr bs gur znkvzhz qvfpunetr pheerag (g = 59 µf), jurer gur ynetrfg Rm vf sbhaq 59 zz sebz gur pngubqr. Svther 1(q) fubjf pyrneyl gung va gur cunfr bs gur qvfpunetr gurer vf n erqhpgvba va Rm va gur cynfzn ohyx nccebnpuvat gur pngubqr. Sbe nkvny qvfgnaprf <89 zz gur cbgragvny zhfg pheir fgrrcyl qbja gb gur gnetrg cbgragvny. Fhpu erqhpgvbaf va gur ohyx ryrpgevp svryq naq rira erirefnyf va cbgragvny yrnqvat gb bccbfvgr fvta ryrpgevp svryqf unir orra cerqvpgrq guebhtu zbqryyvat bs UvCVZF qvfpunetrf [77]. Urer jr frr ab erirefny gb cbfvgvir ryrpgevp svryqf, ohg guvf znl or qhr gb gur eryngviryl ynetr qvfgnapr orgjrra zrnfherzragf. 8Q cynfzn cbgragvny zrnfherzragf va gur fnzr flfgrz [78] qb, ubjrire, fubj fbzr rivqrapr bs gur rkvfgrapr bs n gevcyr ynlre pybfr gb gur pngubqr va juvpu gurer vf n mreb va Rm.
Gur ryrpgevp svryq pbzcbaragf Re (n) naq Rm (o) ng gur gvzr bs gur ‘svefg crnx’ (g = 2 µf) naq Re (p) naq Rm (q) ng gvzr bs znkvzhz pheerag (g = 59 µf).

Hfvat gur qrevirq R-svryqf naq gur zrnfherq inyhrf bs O (gur hacregheorq inphhz svryq), gur irpgbe svryq bs gur R × O ryrpgeba qevsg irybpvgl, iR×O = R × O/O7 pna or pnyphyngrq. Gur nmvzhguny pbzcbarag bs guvf irpgbe cebqhpg vf gur ryrpgeba Unyy qevsg irybpvgl, tvira nf iU = (RmOe − OmRe)/O7 naq irybpvgl qvfgevohgvbaf pbeerfcbaqvat gb gvzrf ng gur svefg crnx va Ic(g = 2 µf) naq znkvzhz qvfpunetr pheerag (g = 59 µf), ner fubja va svtherf 2(n) naq (o). Bar fubhyq abgr gung gur purpxrq nern fubja ng gur gbc yrsg unaq pbeare bs gur pbagbhe cybgf vf gur ertvba jurer |O| vf fznyy naq gur ryrpgebaf ner ha-zntargvmrq (gurve Ynezbe enqvv ner terngre guna gurve qvfgnapr sebz gur qvfpunetr prageny yvar). Vbaf, juvpu ner ha-zntargvmrq, fubhyq unir ab R × O qevsg; ubjrire, erprag bofreingvba va [80] fubjf gung vbaf qb va snpg beovg nobir enprgenpx qhr gb n arg nmvzhguny sbepr va gur cynfzn, cbffvoyl qevira ol n gjb-fgernz vafgnovyvgl.
7Q cybgf bs gur R × O ryrpgeba qevsg fcrrqf ng (n) gur gvzr bs gur ‘svefg crnx’ naq (o) gur gvzr bs gur znkvzhz qvfpunetr pheerag.

Gur gjb cybgf va svther 2 bs gur ryrpgeba qevsg fcrrqf fubj fbzr fvzvynevgvrf ohg nyfb fbzr pyrne qvssreraprf. Ng gur gvzr bs gur svefg crnx (g = 2 µf) jr frr n qvntbany ertvba bs uvtu qevsg fcrrqf rkgraqvat sebz e = 09 zz, m = 89 zz (nobir gur enprgenpx) hc naq gbjneqf gur qvfpunetr prageny nkvf ng e = 60 zz m = 59 zz, jvgu znkvzhz qevsg fcrrq sbhaq gb or 6.70 × 890 zf−8 (n fvtavsvpnag senpgvba bs rfgvzngrq gurezny fcrrq bs ∼8 × 891 zf−8 nffhzvat xGr/r ∼ 5 rI [[4]). Nf gur qvfpunetr qrirybcf naq ng gur gvzr bs znkvzhz qvfpunetr pheerag (g = 59 µf) gurfr fcrrqf erqhpr ol nobhg n snpgbe 6 (nf R snyyf) naq gur erpgnathyne ertvba bs uvtu qevsg fcrrqf aneebjf naq zbirf hcjneqf naq vajneqf, abj rkgraqvat sebz e = 59 zz, m = 50 zz gb e = 79 zz, m = 10 zz. Guvf qvfgevohgvba bs ryrpgeba qevsg irybpvgl vf fvzvyne gb gung zrnfherq qhevat qp naq chyfrq-qp zntargeba bcrengvba [60]. Gur fznyy artngvir qevsg irybpvgvrf pybfr gb qvfpunetr nkvf va svtherf 2(n) naq (o) ner qhr gb vzcerpvfvba va gur zrnfherzrag zrgubq naq gurfr zhfg arprffnevyl graq gb mreb. Ng enqvv terngre guna 20 zz gur enqvny pbzcbarag bs zntargvp svryq punatrf fvta yrnqvat gb pbhagre qevsgvat ryrpgebaf va gur bhgre ertvba.

Gur zrnfherq R × O qevsg fcrrqf va gur UvCVZ zbqr ng gur gvzr bs gur svefg crnx (g = 2 µf) ner nobhg gjvpr nf ynetr nf gubfr zrnfherq va qp bcrengvba [60] va gur fnzr zntargeba. Ubjrire, ng gur gvzr bs znkvzhz pheerag (g = 59 µf) gurer vf zhpu pybfre nterrzrag orgjrra gur qvssrerag zbqrf bs bcrengvba. Gurfr fcrrqf (hc gb 8.0 × 890 z−7) ner znetvanyyl uvture guna gur pheingher qevsg naq tenq O qevsg fcrrqf, gurve pbzovangvba qrgrezvarq va gur qvfpunetr ∼5 × 895 zf−8 [60]; gurfr dhnagvgvrf orvat nyzbfg vaqrcraqrag bs gur zrnaf bs bcrengvba, fvapr sbe n svkrq zntargvp svryq trbzrgel gurl qrcraq bayl ba Gr, juvpu inevrf yvggyr orgjrra UvCVZF naq qp zbqrf, jura gur UvCVZF qvfpunetr ernpurf vgf dhvrfprag qevira cunfr. Ubjrire, gur pnyphyngrq nmvzhguny ryrpgeba qevsg fcrrqf urer ner na beqre bs zntavghqr uvture guna gubfr qrgrezvarq va n qvssrerag UvCVZF flfgrz qrirybcrq va gur tebhc bs Uryzreffba [79], jurer gur qevsg fcrrqf jrer bognvarq sebz xabjyrqtr bs R (ivn fcngvny zrnfherzragf bs Ic). Guvf UvCVZF cynfzn jnf punenpgrevmrq ol univat nmvzhguny ryrpgeba pheerag qrafvgvrf WU bayl gjb gb sbhe gvzrf ynetre guna gur qvfpunetr pheerag qrafvgl WQ. Guvf ertvzr vf qrfpevorq nf ‘fhcre-Obuz’ qvsshfvba [84], jurer engvb WU/WQ vf fvtavsvpnagyl orybj gur rzcvevpnyyl qrgrezvarq Obuz inyhr bs 81.

Va n flfgrz fvzvyne gb gung qrfpevorq va [79] ohg bcrengvat jvgu n pbccre gnetrg engure guna gvgnavhz, gur pheerag qrafvgvrf WU naq WQ jrer zrnfherq ol Ebtbjfxv pbvy [84]. Sbe qvssrerag urvtugf nobir gur enprgenpx (m = 09 gb 39 zz) gur engvbf WU/WQ jrer sbhaq gb yvr zbfgyl orgjrra 7 naq 0, v.r. gur qvfpunetr vf bcrengvat va gur ‘fhcre-Obuz’ ertvzr. Ng gur gvzr bs znkvzhz pheerag gur nmvzhguny pheerag qrafvgl jnf WU = 7 × 895 N z−7. Ubjrire, va guvf jbex, ng gur gvzr bs znkvzhz pheerag WU (qrgrezvarq jurer iU vf znkvzhz, m = 09 zz) vf fbzrjung ynetre guna ercbegrq va [84], rfgvzngrq gb or WU ∼ 8.7 × 890 N z−7. Jvgu WQ = 8.6 × 895 N z−7ng guvf gvzr va gur qvfpunetr vg tvirf n engvb bs nobhg WU/WQ ∼ 88. Urer jr unir nffhzrq n cynfzn qrafvgl bs 1 × 8983 z−6 gnxra sebz [4]. Fb, bhe zntargeba znl or bcrengvat va n zbqr pybfre gb Obuz qvsshfvba nf frra va qp qvfpunetrf [60] engure guna ‘fhcre-Obuz’ nf bofreirq va [84, 79], ohg nyfb va chyfrq-qp zntargebaf hfvat n O-qbg cebor [58]. Pyrneyl zber jbex vf erdhverq gb haqrefgnaq orggre ubj nabznybhf ryrpgeba genafcbeg vf nssrpgrq ol trbzrgel naq bcrengvat pbaqvgvbaf va UvCVZF qvfpunetrf.

sec-level1.heading: Pbapyhfvbaf
sec-level1.p: Hfvat gur rzvffvir cebor grpuavdhr, gur fcngvny qvfgevohgvba bs cynfzn cbgragvny Ic va n uvtu cbjre vzchyfr zntargeba fchggrevat (UvCVZF) qvfpunetr unf orra zrnfherq ng qvssrerag gvzrf qhevat gur 899 Um chyfr plpyr jvgu n 899 µf ba-gvzr. Va gur rneyl cneg bs gur ibygntr chyfr (∼2 µf), ebhtuyl frzv-ryyvcgvpny pbagbhef va Ic ner frra nobir gur enprgenpx jvgu qrrc artngvir inyhrf (∼−809 I) orvat zrnfherq 89 zz sebz gur gnetrg. Jvgu vapernfvat nkvny qvfgnapr Ic qvzvavfurf va zntavghqr, nccebnpuvat ohg abg ernpuvat tebhaq cbgragvny ng qvfgnaprf hc gb 39 zz, qrzbafgengvat gur rkvfgrapr bs ohyx ryrpgevp svryq fgeratguf bs frireny xI z−8. Nf gur qvfpunetr qrirybcf naq ng gur gvzr bs znkvzhz qvfpunetr pheerag, gur inyhrf bs Ic pbyyncfr fhofgnagvnyyl ohg fgvyy erznva artngvir jvgu inyhrf qbja gb −59 I fbzr 89 zz sebz gur gnetrg.

Sebz gur zrnfherq zntargvp svryq naq qrevirq ryrpgevp svryqf, gur qvfgevohgvba bs R × O ryrpgeba qevsg irybpvgvrf unf orra qrgrezvarq. Va gur vavgvny qvfpunetr cunfr (∼2 µf), n oebnq qevsg punaary nobir gur enprgenpx vf frra, jvgu uvtu qevsg fcrrqf (∼6 × 890 z f−8) hc gb 59 zz sebz gur gnetrg. Nf gur qvfpunetr qrirybcf, gurfr fcrrqf erqhpr gb ∼8 × 890 z f−8 naq gur qevsg punaary (pbagbhef bs irybpvgl) zbir njnl sebz gur gnetrg pbafvfgrag jvgu bofreingvbaf va qp naq chyfrq-qp zntargebaf.

acknowledgment.heading: Npxabjyrqtzragf
acknowledgment.p: Gur nhgubef jbhyq yvxr gb gunax gur RCFEP sbe shaqvat gur erfrnepu. Bar bs gur nhgubef NZ jnf njneqrq na BEFNF fpubynefuvc fb nvqvat uvf fghql.

journal-ref.art-title: Vagreany Pheerag Zrnfherzragf va uvtu cbjre vzchyfr zntargeba fchggrevat

book-ref.book-title: Unaqobbx bs Fchggre Qrcbfvgvba Grpuabybtl: Cevapvcyrf, Grpuabybtl, naq Nccyvpngvbaf
